snippet: Governor Andrew M. Cuomo’s proposals included creating an office to enforce state election law and allowing voters and candidates to switch their party enrollment closer to the election date.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo offers second set of proposals on heels of two new corruption cases involving state lawmakers; they include creating an office to enforce state election law and allowing voters and candidates to switch their party enrollment closer to election date.
lead_paragraph: Governor Andrew M. Cuomo’s proposals included creating an office to enforce state election law and allowing voters and candidates to switch their party enrollment closer to the election date.

headline.main: Cuomo Adds Election Law Office to Anticorruption Proposals
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Adds Election Law Office to Anticorruption Proposals
